channel.title: Useful CSS Buttons
channel.description:
I know they aren't COMPLETELY made out of CSS but you get the concept. There is multiple colors. These are buttons made from anchor tags but you could easily use the css to style input buttons.
[center][img]http://rspsdesigns.com/downloads/Source/library/thumb.php?f=tpl/uploads/buttons.png&method=contain&w=300&h=300[/img]
[url=http://rspsdesigns.com/downloads/Source/downloads.php?download=12]Download...[/url][/center]

item.title: Useful CSS Buttons
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

TheAmmoBandit:

Nice release, checked out your site (rspsdesign.com) and noticed that 4 templates are from AC-Web --’ i can even name the real authors of it.

I’d love to see this website that has my templates. All of my templates are made by me minus the jQuery sliders.

Read full topic
